name: Tasty Seasoned Oyster Crackers
author: JulieCC
summary: A wonderful seasoned oyster cracker recipe similar to others, but with different quantities and ingredients.  So great as a snack or on salads.  My kids love them!  Quick, easy, and tasty!
directions: Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C)
In a large bowl, mix the canola oil, ranch dressing mix, dill, lemon pepper, granulated garlic, onion powder, seasoned salt, and white pepper until thoroughly combined
Gently mix the crackers with the seasonings, tossing to coat the crackers with the seasoned oil
Spread the crackers out onto a jelly roll pan in a single layer
Bake in the preheated oven until the crackers are very lightly browned at the edges, 15 to 20 minutes, stirring to bake other sides halfway through cooking
Allow to cool completely before storing in airtight canister or resealable plastic bag
